## Architecture

```{mermaid}
%%| classes: lightbox
flowchart LR
  subgraph ingestion
  end
  ingestion:::wf
  subgraph process_samples
    direction LR
    split_modalities --> gex & atac & adt & vdj & other --> merge
    split_modalities[Split]:::subwf
    gex[GEX]:::subwf
    atac[ATAC]:::subwf
    adt[ADT]:::subwf
    vdj[VDJ]:::subwf
    other[Other]:::subwf
    merge[Merge]:::subwf
  end
  process_samples:::wf
  raw_counts --- ingestion --> raw_h5mu
  raw_h5mu --- split_modalities
  merge --> processed_h5mu
  integration[Integration]:::wf
  processed_h5mu --- integration ---> integrated_h5mu
  subgraph downstream[Downstream]
    integrated_h5mu & reference_atlas --> celltype_annotation --> annotated_h5mu
    celltype_annotation[Cell type annotation]:::subwf
  end
  downstream:::wf
  integrated_h5mu --- downstream
```
